name: Gangster City:Police Hunter Cr
description:
Gangster City:Police Hunter Crime is thrill of police driving city in gangster crime games. In order to take revenge from the gangster and eliminate the real gansta crime. Have fun with police car chase and police shooting at crime city simulator. Your duty driver as a police officer is to keep the city roads a safe place by chasing down the most wanted criminals and street robbers. Every mission will be a hot pursuit police car chase which will test your car driving and shooting skills.
Features:
- 3D eye catching environment with HD graphics.
- Chasing Cars game.
- Police lights scare the criminals away.
- Drift police car through bowed roads.
- Huge selection of police vehicles
- Real sound effects of police car siren.
- Optimized smooth tilt, steer & swipe controls
- Extreme highway pursuit stunt car driving
